sentences.english: The first use of cemented fragmental rock filling in China was conducted atTongkeng tin mine operated by Dachang Mine Bureau.

sentences.english: Furthermore, a portion of space is filled with clay and cementing material .
sentences.chinese: 而且，部分孔隙被粘土和膠結物質填充。

sentences.english: Then, the sodium silicate solution will produce gel reaction in acidic environment.
sentences.chinese: 其次，水玻璃溶液遇到酸性環境會產生膠結作用。

sentences.chinese: 蘇北金湖凹陷阜寧組砂岩儲層中的膠結物爲片鈉鋁石。

sentences.english: The phosphate also acts as a binder.
sentences.chinese: 磷礦還起膠結劑的作用。

sentences.english: However, the loess with dense microstructure particles has less high-frequency components and "shorter"power-chain transmission.
sentences.chinese: 膠結較緊密的土層高頻成分少，力鏈傳遞“近”。

sentences.english: The rotating contacts are made with copper or silver sheet and have rectangular shape glued on the wheel.
sentences.chinese: 旋轉接觸與銅或銀板，並有長方形膠結對車輪。

sentences.english: Cementing material can also be extracted from lunar resources.
